Jeremiah 41:1 And it came to passH1961 in month,H2320 the seventhH7637 [that] cameH0935 IshmaelH3458 sonH1121 of NethaniahH5418 the sonH1121 of Elishama,H0476 of familyH2233 the royal,H4410 and of the officersH7227 of the king,H4428 and tenH6235 with menH0376 withH0854 toH0413 GedaliahH1436 sonH1121 of AhikamH0296 at Mizpah.H4709 And they ateH0398 thereH8033 breadH3899 togetherH3162 in Mizpah.H4709

Lamentations 1:1 HowH0349 sitsH3427 lonely,H0910 the cityH5892 [once] fullH7227 of people!H5971 she has becomeH1961 like a widow!H0490 [once] greatH7227 among the nations,H1471 the princessH8282 among the provinces,H4082 she has becomeH1961 a slave!H4522
